price: ߛߎ ߟߐ߭ ߟߋ߬ ߓߊ߲ߓߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߜߡߊ ߦߋ߫ ( ߛߣߐ߬ߡߍ ߘߐ߫ ) ߘߋ߬ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߝߐߕߊ ߕߋߟߋ߲ߣߍ߲ߓߊ ߦߋ߫ ߖߐ߲
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
